question_1.question: What can TimeXtender 6024.1 Documentation be generated for?

options.option_d: ODX instances, Data Warehouse instances, and Semantic Model instances

question_1.explanation: TimeXtender 6024.1 Documentation can be generated for ODX instances, Data Warehouse instances, and Semantic Model instances, including individual data areas within instances.

question_2.question: How can you generate a deployment status report in TimeXtender?

options.option_b: By generating it on an instance or data area level

question_2.explanation: A deployment status report can be generated on an instance level as well as a data area level within TimeXtender.

question_3.question: How can you display data lineage for a specific field in TimeXtender?

options.option_b: Right-click on the field and select Data Lineage
options.option_c: Go to the Object Dependencies menu
options.option_d: Click the refresh button in the Content section

question_3.explanation: To show data lineage, you need to right-click on a field and then click Data Lineage, as per the instructions provided in the context.

question_4.question: What should you do to customize the display of objects in the visualization window of TimeXtender?

options.option_b: Right-click the background to bring up the customization menu

question_4.explanation: To customize the display, you right-click the background in the visualization window to bring up a menu with different options for organizing and displaying the data.
